title: Niamh Peren: Disrupting the Status Quo by Design | Student Profiles

media:group.media:title: Niamh Peren: Disrupting the Status Quo by Design | Student Profiles
media:group.media:description:
After launching a recycling campaign in New Zealand, Niamh came to Parsons seeking design strategy skills to make broader change. Her collaborative community is inspiring her to disrupt the status quo through new challenges. 

Niamh came to Parsons having already launched a grassroots recycling campaign in New Zealand and worked in film. She met a Parsons professor who shared his perspective that with additional design strategy skills, Niamh could augment her professional and change-making capacity. She enrolled and found a collaborative and progressive community to inspire her to disrupt the status quo and take on new challenges related to environmental sustainability and social justice.   
Learn more: 
PARSONS SCHOOL OF DESIGN | https://newschool.edu/parsons  
THE NEW SCHOOL | https://newschool.edu
